timeline.bodyText: Seems <bytes_to_print> should have surrounding [] characters since it's optional. The following help could also mention the default of 256.
timeline.author: pshipton

timeline.bodyText: I don't think the brackets are needed.
timeline.author: pshipton

timeline.message:
Improve jdmpview 'hexdump' command

* accept length in hex
* make error messages more helpful
* improve EBCDIC table

Signed-off-by: Keith W. Campbell <keithc@ca.ibm.com>

Improve jdmpview 'hexdump' command

* accept length in hex
* make error messages more helpful
* improve EBCDIC table

Signed-off-by: Keith W. Campbell <keithc@ca.ibm.com>
